'''Anemo Sigils''' can be exchanged for various items in [[Mondstadt]]'s [[Souvenir Shop]].

==Trivia==
*During [[Collector of Anemo Sigils]], [[Marjorie]] says that Anemo Sigils have properties that other materials cannot provide.
